ohu garubiya labimata watina dewi kenek.+ siyallantama eka ha samanawa salakana+ ohu kisiwekugen allasak ganne naha.+ 18 piya nathi daruwa ha wandambauwa wenuwen ohu sadharanaya itu karayi.+ oba athare sitina wideshikayatath+ ohu kisima wenasak nokara ohuta prema karamin kama bima ha andum palandum laba deyi. 19 ee nisa oba athare sitina wideshikayanta obath prema kala yuthuyi.+ obath yam kalayak eejipthuwe wideshikayan lesa jiwath wu bawa kisi dinaka amathaka karanna epa.+ 20 “oba yehowa dewita garubiya dakwiya yuthuyi.+ oba namaskara kala yuththe ohuta pamanayi.+ ohu mathama randa sitinna.+ oba yam deyak gana diwura porondu wana wita ohuge namayen pamanak ese karanna.+ 21 obe prashansawa labiya yuththe ohu pamanayi.+ manda obe dewi wanne ohuyi.
